title: DuoWei: WeChat Multi-opener
headline: DuoWei: WeChat Multi-opener
status_0: Please enter the number of WeChat to open and click the Run button.
status_1: WeChat path is empty. Please select it.
status_2: Do not find executable file in the path. Please select right path or reinstall WeChat.
